channel.title: I need help making a command
channel.description:
[b]Problem:[/b]I need help making teleport commands.I'm a noob coder so i need a very detailed tut please..i dont know where to add stuff.Would greatly aprectiate it.
[b]Serverbase:[/b]TestScape
[b]Difficulty:[/b]About 1-3 if you are a good coder.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 03:34:25 PM[/size][hr]Anyone please..

item.title: I need help making a command
item.dc:creator: @Billys_Java Billys Java
item.description:
@Billys_Java wrote:

just add this && playerRights >= 2) so it will look like this in the end

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“gotobarrows”) && playerRights >= 2)

{
	teleportToX = 3565;
	teleportToY = 3311;
            heightLevel = 0;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: I need help making a command
item.dc:creator: @Billys_Java Billys Java
item.description:
@Billys_Java wrote:

[code]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“gotobarrows”))

{
	teleportToX = 3565;
	teleportToY = 3311;
            heightLevel = 0;
}[/code]

alright well lets breakdown this here teleport command to what everthing means.

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gotobarrows"))

alright now the command.equalsIgnoreCase means that it will ignore if you have caps on or something in the server so when you type it in it doesnt matter if you have capital letters or not. the (“gotobarrows”) is the name of the command so ingame you would type ::gotobarrows and it would telly you to barrows.

teleportToX = 3565; teleportToY = 3311;

now the teleporttox = 3565 is the x coordinate on the map. Think of the map as a grid because basically it is. so the x corrdinate is the left or right dirrection of the map. now the Teleporttoy = 3311 is the y coordinate of the map so once you get both of those points and put them together its like finding a point on a grid. That will be the point you telly to.

                heightLevel = 0;

this is simply the hieghtlevel of your character when you telly. If changed it to a 1 it will telly you to the second floor. and so on. Now if you make it a negative number eg. -1 then it will telly you underground.

Read full topic
